镰状细胞病的传统治疗方法和新型营养干预措施综述涉及镰状细胞病 (SCD) 患者（尤其是非洲患者）的营养相关研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Review-of-traditional-treatments-and-novel-nutritional-interventions-for-sickle-cell-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Review-of-traditional-treatments-and-novel-nutritional-interventions-for-sickle-cell-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88ef7e98-7b36-42d8-b299-eae5e0fe75e9 Wed, 17 Jan 2024 04:32:00 -0500 Review of traditional treatments and novel nutritional interventions for sickle cell disease
CGRP 拮抗剂和饮食改变显示出治疗偏头痛的希望《Medicina》中的评论探讨了偏头痛治疗的进展，强调了 CGRP 拮抗剂和生酮饮食和低血糖饮食等饮食干预措施在降低偏头痛频率和严重程度方面的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/CGRP-antagonists-and-dietary-changes-show-promise-for-migraine-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/CGRP-antagonists-and-dietary-changes-show-promise-for-migraine-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52c464b4-a098-47ca-97b0-62a95fe75a00 Wed, 17 Jan 2024 00:04:00 -0500 CGRP antagonists and dietary changes show promise for migraine treatment
3 期试验表明 acoramidis 对转甲状​​腺素蛋白淀粉样心肌病安全有效心脏每天跳动超过 100,000 次，是向我们的器官输送氧气和营养以维持健康的身体功能所需的关键肌肉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Phase-3-trial-shows-acoramidis-safe-and- effective-for-transthyretin-amyloid-cardiomyopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Phase-3-trial-shows-acoramidis-safe-and- effective-for-transthyretin-amyloid-cardiomyopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8156ba2-26b0-49c8-99fa-84f3d8ddec45 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 23:56:32 -0500 Phase 3 trial shows acoramidis safe and effective for transthyretin amyloid cardiomyopathy
南加州大学的新研究揭示了 DNA 环如何沉默基因活性人类生命的蓝图存在于我们每个细胞的细胞核中的 DNA 中。在人类细胞中，必须压缩大约六英尺半的这种遗传物质才能装入细胞核内。 DNA 凝聚不是随机的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/New-USC-study-reveals-how-DNA-loops-silence-gene-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/New-USC-study-reveals-how-DNA-loops-silence-gene-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59ff92fc-3a68-432d-848d-d7db21bca8fd Tue, 16 Jan 2024 23:51:50 -0500 New USC study reveals how DNA loops silence gene activity
蜘蛛毒液分子符合治疗心脏病和中风的基准昆士兰大学团队正在研究的一种蜘蛛毒液分子已达到治疗心脏病和中风的关键基准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Spider-venom-molecule-meets-benchmarks-to-treat-heart-attack-and-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Spider-venom-molecule-meets-benchmarks-to-treat-heart-attack-and-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb6dfdc1-5ed6-4f43-99c2-a468476cad48 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 23:46:29 -0500 Spider venom molecule meets benchmarks to treat heart attack and stroke
短效抗体以最小的副作用抑制细胞因子风暴细胞因子是化学信使，可以帮助身体清除入侵的细菌和病毒，并控制炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Short-acting-antibody-curbs-cytokine-storms-with-minimal-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Short-acting-antibody-curbs-cytokine-storms-with-minimal-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ed2929c-434e-4e77-bd75-630367fd0f11 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 23:42:30 -0500 Short-acting antibody curbs cytokine storms with minimal side effects
疫苗接种可针对儿童长期感染新冠病毒提供适度保护针对引起 COVID-19 的病毒 SARS-CoV-2 的疫苗接种可降低儿童和青少年患严重急性疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Vaccination-provides-moderate-protection-against-long-COVID-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Vaccination-provides-moderate-protection-against-long-COVID-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94509a55-81d9-4b3e-9af5-d844f60bf051 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 23:38:41 -0500 Vaccination provides moderate protection against long COVID in children
芦笋根提取物成为有前途的天然乳化剂和潜在的抗肥胖剂《食品》杂志上的研究描述了芦笋根中皂苷提取物的特征，强调了它们在食品和化妆品中作为天然乳化剂和发泡剂的潜力，以及它们对胰腺脂肪酶的抑制活性，表明其在抗肥胖方面的应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Asparagus-root-extracts-emerge-as-promising-natural-emulsifiers-and-pottial-anti-obesity-agents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Asparagus-root-extracts-emerge-as-promising-natural-emulsifiers-and-pottial-anti-obesity-agents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a79bad2-405d-4951-9397-65ca094e2088 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 23:15:00 -0500 Asparagus root extracts emerge as promising natural emulsifiers and potential anti-obesity agents
人工智能在检测风湿性心脏病方面表现出与心脏病专家相同的准确性最新研究表明，人工智能 (AI) 有潜力以与心脏病专家相同的准确度来检测风湿性心脏病 (RHD)，该研究展示了如何将复杂的深度学习技术应用于这种不公平的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/AI-shows-the-same-accuracy-as-a-cardiograph-in-detecting-rheumatic-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/AI-shows-the-same-accuracy-as-a-cardiograph-in-detecting-rheumatic-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5bbe3c6a-5256-4b9c-9835-ee2dfac4fda5 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 22:55:30 -0500 AI shows the same accuracy as a cardiologist in detecting rheumatic heart disease
